w:HTMLPanel.w:Heading: Icon
w:HTMLPanel.p: Icons are based on a webfont mechanism provided by fontello. Uni-color the webfont icons inherit the size and the color from the css. Really lightweight this mecanism reduce the server consumption.
You can find the full default icon set on icons.html

ul.li:
type : define the icon. It will be use to resolve the css Icon class name.
All the _ are automatically replaced with -
The type is not case sensitive.
If css class does'nt exists the icon isn't visible no warning or error occures
color : Bootstrap text color are relevent for Icon (SUCCESS, DANGER, INFO, WARNING, MUTED)

c:StaticCode.pre: <w:Icon type="OK" color="SUCCESS"/> <w:Icon type="CANCEL" color="DANGER"/> <w:Icon type="PLUS" color="INFO"/> <w:Icon type="MINUS" color="WARNING"/> <w:Icon type="LEFT_OPEN" color="MUTED"/> <w:Icon type="RIGHT_OPEN"/>
